Chief Chika Okpala MFR (amụrụ na 10 June 1950) bụ onye Naijiria na eme ihe ọchị. 
A maara ya nke ọma dị ka Chief Zebrudaya aha nna ọ nwetara site na ọrụ ya dị na Onyeisi zebrudya na usoro ihe nkiri TV, New Masquerade, nke gosipụtara site n'afọ 1983 ruo 1993.

Ọ gara Ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị Prince Memorial na Onitsha, obodo dị na Anambra Steeti, Southeastern Nigeria, n'etiti afọ 1964 na 1972. O mechara nweta nzere bachelọ nke sayensị (B.Sc.) na Enugu State University of Sciences and Technology na 1996.
